title: "NERVE Lab Data Management Guide"
---

## Introduction

This website is meant to serve as an introduction to:

- loading and analyzing large neuroimaging datasets at UVM
- data science project best practices
- doing reproducible science.

This guide will reference [instructions](https://github.com/ajbarrows/abcd-puberty) in this repository.

This guide also presumes the following:

- you have an account with the [Vermont Advanced Computing Center (VACC)](https://www.uvm.edu/vacc)
- you are using one of the following operating systems:
    - Linux (any distribution)
    - macOS
    - [Windows Subsystem for Linux (WSL)](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/wsl/install)
